Hello world! I created this page for the freeCodeCamp portfolio project, using it to showcase the other freeCodeCamp projects I have designed. The designs are original except where for each project's requirements. I have left the testing script in each project (including this portfolio project) so that you can see the tests and how they are passing. The requirements are also clearly labeled via comments in the code.
